meet up.translation[0].definitions[0].de: to meet someone in order to do something together
meet up.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: We often meet up after work and go for a drink.
I’ve got to go now, but I’ll meet up with you later.
meet up.translation[0].definitions[1].de: if roads, paths etc meet up, they join together at a particular place
meet up.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: The path eventually meets up with the main road.
